scripts.build:docs: bun run --bun build && cd packages/docs && bun run --bun build
scripts.build:docs:dev: bun run --bun build:dev && cd packages/docs && bun run --bun build
scripts.dev: bun run --bun build:dev && cd packages/docs && bun run --bun dev
scripts.play: bun run --bun build:dev && cd packages/playground && bun run --bun dev
scripts.logs: bun run --bun build:dev && cd packages/logs && bun run --bun dev
scripts.update:tw: bun i tailwindcss@latest @tailwindcss/cli@latest @tailwindcss/vite@latest && cd packages/docs && bun i @tailwindcss/vite@latest && cd ../playground && bun i @tailwindcss/vite@latest
scripts.publish:alpha: bun run --bun build && cd packages/daisyui && bun publish --tag=alpha
scripts.publish:beta: bun run --bun build && cd packages/daisyui && bun publish --tag=beta
